item.title: Phil Wickham - This Is Amazing Grace
item.description:
For educational use.
This is Amazing Grace by Phil Wickham. It’s been raised by 2 semitones so color coded handbells (deskbells) can play along. If you’ve ever used the Kristal Bell method, it’s just like that! Hand out the color coded bells and tell the kids to shake them when their color/letter is highlighted!
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
